DOC.brief_summary: This observational safety study prophylactic use Flu Egg Derived Adjuvanted Swine Origin A ( H1N1 ) Vaccine subject 6 month age old . Subjects may receive either 1 2 dos : child elderly receive 2 dos adult receive either 1 2 dos .
